org.gbif.dwca.io

Class Archive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.dwca.io.Archive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<StarRecord>

    public class Archive
extends Object
implements Iterable<StarRecord>
    A darwin core star archive allowing easy reading and iteration over a core record with all its extensions.
    See Also:
    Darwin Core Text Guide

      • getConstituentMetadata

        public Map<String,File> getConstituentMetadata()
        Scans the archive for a semi standard support of dataset constituent metadata. A dataset constituent is a subdataset which is referenced via dwc:datasetID in the data. The agreement first introduced by catalogue of life for their GSDs is to have a new folder "dataset" that keeps a metadata file for each constituent named just as the datasetID and suffixed with .xml.
        Returns:
        map of constituent datasetID to metadata file inside the archive

      • iterator

        public org.gbif.utils.file.ClosableIterator<StarRecord> iterator()
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<StarRecord>
        Returns:
        a complete iterator using star records with all extension records that replace literal null values and html entities.

      • iteratorRaw

        public org.gbif.utils.file.ClosableIterator<StarRecord> iteratorRaw()
        Returns:
        a complete iterator using star records with all extension records that are not replacing literal null values or html entities.

      • iteratorDwc

        public org.gbif.utils.file.ClosableIterator<DarwinCoreRecord> iteratorDwc()
        Returns:
        an iterator over simple darwin core records based on the core data file(s). The DarwinCoreRecord instance is reused to give better performance, so create a clone before referencing it.
